topic.title: Concerned about going on any websites on zeronet
topic.body: Is there any way to disable offline site downloading or at least image downloading to your local hard drive. I dont wan't to get any bad stuff on my hard drive. I know I can avoid sites but some things are just too hard to avoid,

1581695503_14dsVvztuXjBxWmk4s4HjUnxuN4Ae.body: Nah just make a "gaming" privacy tool lol

1581933903_14dsVvztuXjBxWmk4s4HjUnxuN4Ae.body: If you are going to use a vm I recommend qemu with kvm and gpu passthrough

1582442446_1JmxhPt4FDP7rTmmaxoKdwTSDhwg5.body:
> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_1872_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): just don't connect to it; end of the story:use your head.
Can you at least answer my question if there is  a way to stop zeronet from downloading sites to be used offline.

1582649582_13EafRdDw5sZF42dTn68uDdcssTWK.body: Fuck you stop trying to advertise your dumb app that nobody fucking wants you perverted fuck
